table_set_default set_port _drop
table_set_default modify_flags _drop
table_add modify_flags _modify_flags 0&&&0b0000000000000000000000000001000000000000000000000000000000000000 10.0.0.2 => 0 2
table_add modify_flags _modify_flags 68719476736&&&0b0000000000000000000000000001000000000000000000000000000000000000 10.0.0.2 => 1 1 
table_add set_port _set_port 0&&&0b0000000000000000000000000001000000000000000000000000000000000000 01 => 02 2
table_add set_port _set_port 68719476736&&&0b0000000000000000000000000001000000000000000000000000000000000000 01 => 02 1 
table_add set_port _set_port 0&&&0 02 => 01 3
table_add set_port _set_port 0&&&0 03 => 01 4
table_add note_flag _note_flag 34359738368&&&0b0000000000000000000000000001110000000000000000000000000000000000 0 => 1
table_add note_flag _note_flag 103079215104&&&0b0000000000000000000000000001110000000000000000000000000000000000 0 => 0
table_add de_note_flag _note_flag 0&&&0b0000000000000000000000000001110000000000000000000000000000000000 => 0 
table_add de_note_flag _note_flag 68719476736&&&0b0000000000000000000000000001110000000000000000000000000000000000 => 0
